dsense.name: keep [sth] in mind, bear [sth] in mind, keep in mind that, bear in mind that

example.eg: Now, keep in mind that in May of 1929 the stock market hadn't crashed yet.
example.egtrans: 现在请记住，1929年5月股市还没有崩盘。

dsense.name: keep [sb] in mind, bear [sb] in mind

example.eg: If you ever need a cleaner, keep me in mind.
example.egtrans: 如果你需要清洁工，请记得找我。
